author: Gayle Cook
text: For those of you with experience in a number of cities, I would like to know what has been your observations with the different training methods and outcomes for existing and new managers.  In addition, do you feel the size of the municipality had any direct influence on the quality and structure of management training.
title: Management Training-Smaller Cities
